text:
Leaving the café "Hitotoki" nestled in the corner of the city,
Under one umbrella, the two head towards the station.

Their words are somewhat awkward,
but they walk, taking care not to get wet under the umbrella──

...Thank you so much!
You really saved me.

Actually, it's the umbrella from "Hitotok"',
so there's no need to thank me.
...I wonder how the rain will be.

It seems to be easing up around my house...
...Whereabouts is your place?

Oh, it's further to the right──...
Around there.

Ah, it seems like the rain will
intensify by the time we arrive...

Oh, in that case, please take this umbrella!
It's borrowed, so it might not be good.

Oh, that's kind of you but
Are you sure...?

Since we're already here, how about returning the umbrella
together next time? ...And maybe exchange contact information?

Yes, that sounds good!
Would Line be okay?

Got it, got it.
I'll send you a stamp!
